cmp: 并 (and/furthermore/(not) at all/simultaneously/also/together with/to combine/to join/to merge, amalgamate/combine, and/also/together with)
mng: to piece together, to join together, to stake all, adventurous, at the risk of one's life, to spell

exm.mng: to piece together, to join together, to stake all, adventurous, at the risk of one's life, to spell
to do one's utmost, with all one's might, at all costs, (to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
to work hard, to try to make a living
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
Hanyu pinyin, the pinyin transliteration system used in PRC since the 1960s
to put sth together from component parts
to grapple (with the enemy), to fight at the risk of one's life
